department: Ministere des Travaux Publics et Servies Gouvernementaux (TPSGC)
short_summary: PEURHE DE DESTRUCTION DE DIVERS SUPPORTS INFORMATIQUES ET OPTIQUES
description: Service Management Centre, CFB Kingston requires the supply, delivery, warranty, installation and training of a device capable of shredding, disintegrating and grinding all types of IT storage media that has a protection level of Secret. All the deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.
